pullRequest.title: Response Server - Audit Log Implementation with Test Cases
pullRequest.bodyText:
Removed ActivityLogRepository and ActivityLog from Response Server bundle.
Removed old audit log implementation methods - createActivityLog() from CommonServiceImpl
Implemented audit log events listed in HIPAA-grade Audit Logs - FDA MyStudies on Google Cloud -EAP V3.1-2020-08-01 - Response Datastore
Code Format+Organize imports.

commit.message:
added audit log implementation for response server

added audit log implementation for response server

nodes.bodyText:
[response-server Checks] reported by reviewdog 🐶
Distance between variable 'notSaveMap' declaration and its first usage is 5, but allowed 3.  Consider making that variable final if you still need to store its value in advance (before method calls that might have side effects on the original value).

[response-server Checks] reported by reviewdog 🐶
Missing a Javadoc comment.

[response-server Checks] reported by reviewdog 🐶
